about_the_game:
King's Gambit is a cooperative, turn-based roguelite with a chess-inspired twist. Team up with a friend to conquer dungeons where the chessboard becomes your enemy, filled with menacing chess-piece foes. You'll move like a King, but your arsenal is far from limited. Wield powerful weapons—hurl knives, brew magical potions, or summon spectral spiders to outsmart your enemies.

Unlock a roster of unique characters, each with distinct weapons, spells, and playstyles. Experiment with new builds through card-based upgrades, refine your strategy, and master tactical chess combat. Whether playing solo or co-op, King's Gambit blends the strategy of chess with the excitement of a roguelite, offering endless replayability.

Embark on a strategic conquest in the mythical land of Nepharalis, where chaos reigns in the wake of King Leonidas's mysterious disappearance.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Embark on your journey solo or team up with a friend. King's Gambit offers seamless online cooperative play, allowing you and a fellow adventurer to experience the entire game together. Strategize and conquer the challenges of Nepharalis as a united force!

  • Prepare for epic confrontations as you encounter boss fights like never before, all set on a dynamic chessboard.

  • The clash for the throne pits you against formidable guild leaders, including powerful warriors, cunning princesses, sinister sorcerers, and devious puppet masters.

  • Choose from a diverse roster of characters, each bringing their own unique weapons, spells, and special abilities to the table. Whether you prefer brute strength, magical prowess, or tactical finesse, there's a hero for every playstyle.

  • Unlock new characters by defeating rival guilds and expand your arsenal of champions.

  • Customize your gameplay with a card-based system. Collect and upgrade cards to enhance your weapons and spells with unique buffs.

  • Build your deck strategically to suit your playstyle and adapt to the evolving challenges of each run. Be wary, however! The cards give as well as they take.

Strategic Depth

  • Inspired by the timeless game of chess, King's Gambit adds layers of strategic depth to the dungeon crawler genre. Plan your moves carefully, anticipate your enemies' actions, and execute precise tactics to outsmart your foes and claim victory.

Guilds

  • Dive into the rich world of Nepharalis, dominated by six distinct guilds. Each guild boasts its own territory, complete with unique hazards, traps, and environments.

  • Encounter a variety of heroes and enemies, each aligned with their respective guilds. Challenge the guild leaders in thrilling battles and uncover the secrets of their domains.

Immersive World

  • Immerse yourself in the beautifully crafted world of Nepharalis, filled with intricate details, captivating lore, and stunning visuals. Discover hidden secrets, uncover ancient mysteries, and experience a rich narrative woven into the gameplay. As the realm teeters on the brink of war, six powerful guilds rise to claim the empty throne. Choose your allegiance from the valiant Lionheart Legion to the covert Dark Veil. Each of the six guilds brings unique strengths, magical abilities, and cunning tactics to the chessboard battlefield. The fate of Nepharalis is in your hands!
detailed_description:
👑CLAIM THE THRONE!👑

Join our Discord Community and connect directly with the developers!

Engage in conversations with the dev team, stay updated on the latest development news, and get exclusive previews of upcoming updates.

We're excited to make a move and get to know you better! 👑✨

name: King's Gambit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: King's Gambit is a turn-based co-op roguelike deckbuilder with a chess twist! Unlock powerful card upgrades to enhance your weapons and spells. Master 18 characters, each with unique abilities - Hurl knives, brew potions, and summon spectral spiders as you battle chess-pieces and bosses!
